subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The United States completed a 5-0 rout of host Switzerland in the first round of the Davis Cup in Fribourg, with 19-year-old Ryan Harrison and John Isner winning the closing matches.
snippet: The United States completed a 5-0 rout of host Switzerland in the first round of the Davis Cup in Fribourg, with 19-year-old Ryan Harrison and John Isner winning the closing matches.
